associateKey

public int associateKey(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                        java.lang.String providerName,
                        java.lang.String key,
                        java.lang.String typeStr)
Associate a package key with provider. Provider is created if it doesn't exist. Key is created if it doesn't exist.

Parameters:
sessionKey - the session key
providerName - the provider name
key - the key string
typeStr - the type string (currently only 'gpg' is supported)
Returns:
1 on success
